sentence.Network_en: Behind the bar , Bruno Tattaglia made a lighter appear magically and held it to Luca's cigarette.
sentence.Network_cn: 布鲁诺-塔塔格里亚从柜台后魔术般地递过来一个打火机给路加点香烟.

sentence.Network_en: In most cases, if a user could achieve his goals magically, without your product, he would.
sentence.Network_cn: 在多数情况下, 如果用户能够神奇地实现其目标, 即使不通过你的产品, 他会这么做的.

sentence.Network_en: If I get my five grand, some items could magically reappear.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我拿回我的5000块, 有些东东就会奇迹般再现.

entry.def: Something that is magical seems to use magic or to be able to produce magic.

example.ex: ...the story of Sin-Sin, a little boy who has magical powers.
example.tran: 一个有魔力的小男孩辛辛的故事

entry.def: You can say that a place or object is magical when it has a special mysterious quality that makes it seem wonderful and exciting.

example.ex: The beautiful island of Cyprus is a magical place to get married.
example.tran: 美丽的塞浦路斯岛是缔结良缘的美妙之地。
